page.title: 22Authors
page.content:
Thirteen pupils of Satterthwaite and Rusland School took part in the BBC Domesday Project in 1986. Unfortunately, because of falling numbers the school was forced to close in 2006, having served the educational needs of the community for over 150 years.

The authors of the 2011 update are Kevin Baverstock and Suzanne Tiplady, both residents of Satterthwaite who are compiling a history of the area. They received assistance from a number of residents and businesses, and a questionnaire sent out with the June edition of the Rusland and Satterthwaite Newsletter helped to fill in the gaps.
Kevin Baverstock and Suzanne Tiplady
